effect.sword_shield: Inflicts regular damage, then (if successful) sets reflect on the user’s side of the field.
effect.the_isle_of_armor: Inflicts regular damage, then (if successful) sets reflect on the user’s side of the field.
effect.the_crown_tundra: Inflicts regular damage, then (if successful) sets reflect on the user’s side of the field.
effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Inflicts regular damage, then (if successful) sets reflect on the user’s side of the field.
effect.legends_arceus: Inflicts regular damage, then (if successful) sets reflect on the user’s side of the field.

short_effect.sword_shield: Sets Reflect on the user’s side of the field after inflicting damage.
short_effect.the_isle_of_armor: Sets Reflect on the user’s side of the field after inflicting damage.
short_effect.the_crown_tundra: Sets Reflect on the user’s side of the field after inflicting damage.
short_effect.brilliant_diamond_and_shining_pearl: Sets Reflect on the user’s side of the field after inflicting damage.
short_effect.legends_arceus: Sets Reflect on the user’s side of the field after inflicting damage.

flavor_text.sword_shield: The user ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon’s moves and Abilities that draw in moves, allowing this move to hit the chosen target.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The user ignores the effects of opposing Pokémon's moves and Abilities that draw in moves, allowing this move to hit the chosen target.
